mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO
( VERSION, CREATETIME, MERCHANTNO, ACCOUNTNO, STATUS, MERCHANTTYPE, MERCHANTKEY, SHORTNAME, FULLNAME, ADDRESS, URL, ICP, LEGALPERSON, CARDNO, CERTIFICATEEXPIRY, SCOPE, LICENSENO, LICENSEEXPIRY, LICENSENOVALID, ORGCODE, NATIONALTAX, LANDTAX, SIGNTIME, CONTRACTVALID, BUSICONTACTNAME, BUSICONTACTMOBILENO, BUSICONTACTEMAIL, BUSICONTACTQQ, TECHCONTACTNAME, TECHCONTACTMOBILENO, TECHCONTACTEMAIL, TECHCONTACTQQ, FAX, IPSEG, MCC,USER_TYPE, REGISTERMONEY,PREAUTHORIZATION,DEPOSIT, ZIPCODE, TELEPHONENUM, BUSINESSAREA, EMPNUM, CARDNO_ADDRESS, LICENSEEXPIRYFORM ) VALUES ( 0, FUN_NOW(), #{merchantNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merchantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificateExpiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseExpiry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseNoValid,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{landTax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contractValid,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{busiContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiContactMobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiContactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busiContactQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techContactMobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techContactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{techContactQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipSeg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mcc}, #{userType}, #{registerMoney}, #{preauthorization}, #{deposit}, #{zipCode}, #{telephoneNum}, #{businessArea}, #{empNum}, #{cardnoAddress}, #{licenseExpiryForm} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , B.PARENT_USER_NO FROM
AS A LEFT JOIN TBL_USER_RELATION AS B ON A.MERCHANTNO = B.CHILD_USER_NO
order by ID desc

if.test: beginDate != null and beginDate != null and endDate != '' and endDate != ''

sql.if: AND MERCHANTNO in (SELECT AGENT_NO FROM TBL_AGENT_RELATION WHERE LEVEL =#{level} )
AND MERCHANTNO in (select MERCHANT_NO from TBL_AGENT_MERCHANT_RELATION where FIRST_AGENT_NO IS NULL OR FIRST_AGENT_NO='')

mapper.select: select MERCHANTTYPE, SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "enterpriseSum", SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "individualSum", SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "memberSum" from TBL_USER_MERCHANT_ONLINE where MERCHANTNO IN #{item} GROUP BY MERCHANTTYPE

select MERCHANTTYPE, SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "enterpriseSum", SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=11 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "individualSum", SUM(CASE WHEN MERCHANTTYPE=10 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS "memberSum" from TBL_USER_MERCHANT_ONLINE where MERCHANTNO IN #{item} GROUP BY MERCHANTTYPE

SELECT CASE WHEN LENGTH(R.THIRD_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.THIRD_AGENT_NO WHEN LENGTH(R.SECOND_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.SECOND_AGENT_NO ELSE R.FIRST_AGENT_NO END AS AGENT_NO, CASE WHEN LENGTH(R.THIRD_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.THIRD_AGENT_NAME WHEN LENGTH(R.SECOND_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.SECOND_AGENT_NAME ELSE R.FIRST_AGENT_NAME END AS AGENT_NAME, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =102) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS CREATED, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =106) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS FIRSTPASS, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =103) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS NOPASS, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =100) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS ACTIVE, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =101) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS INACTIVE, sum(CASE WHEN (T.STATUS =105) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END )AS CLOSE FROM TBL_USER_MERCHANT_ONLINE T,TBL_AGENT_MERCHANT_RELATION R WHERE T.MERCHANTNO = R.MERCHANT_NO AND (R.FIRST_AGENT_NO = #{agentNo} OR R.SECOND_AGENT_NO = #{agentNo} OR R.THIRD_AGENT_NO = #{agentNo} ) GROUP BY CASE WHEN LENGTH(R.THIRD_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.THIRD_AGENT_NO WHEN LENGTH(R.SECOND_AGENT_NO) = 15 THEN R.SECOND_AGENT_NO ELSE R.FIRST_AGENT_NO END
